channel.title: Comments on: Please note that we’ve made some changes to…

item.title: By: Anneliese Taylor
item.dc:creator: Anneliese Taylor
item.description:
Thanks, Erin, for getting everything moved over so expeditiously!
Also, our Open Access fund is back on - it was put on hold temporarily but we are now accepting applications for funding again.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks, Erin, for getting everything moved over so expeditiously!

Also, our Open Access fund is back on – it was put on hold temporarily but we are now accepting applications for funding again.
